actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to the treatment of certain life insurance contracts.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the treatment of decreases in future benefits under modified endowment life insurance contracts.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to the treatment of certain life insurance contracts.
